summary:
## Patient Summary:
Overall, the patient, a 51-year-old white female, has a history of essential hypertension, asthma, and stress, with a current medication regimen including lisinopril and albuterol. Recent encounters include asthma follow-ups and general examinations. The patient has received vaccinations for influenza, COVID-19, and zoster, with recent lab results showing cholesterol levels within normal range.

## Patient Demographics and Background:
- Age: 51
- Gender: Female
- Race: White
- Ethnicity: Non-Hispanic

## Medical History Overview:
- Essential hypertension diagnosed in 2020
- Asthma follow-ups and emergency admissions
- Stress findings in 2020
- Part-time and full-time employment history

## Current Medications and Allergies:
- Current medications: Chlorpheniramine, lisinopril, albuterol, beclomethasone dipropionate
- No known allergies reported

## Recent Healthcare Encounters:
- Asthma follow-ups and general examinations in recent years
- Vaccinations for influenza, COVID-19, and zoster
- Latest encounter: Asthma follow-up in 2023

## Vaccination Status:
- Received vaccinations for Hep A, influenza, COVID-19, and zoster
- No gaps in immunization history noted

## Lifestyle Factors:
- Asthma diagnosis and medication use
- Stress finding in medical history
- No specific details on diet, exercise, or substance use

## Lab Results and Numeric Health Data:
- Recent lab results show normal cholesterol levels and other blood parameters within range

## Quality of Life:
- No specific quality of life scores or outcomes provided

## Local Public Health Context:
The patient resides in Taylor, Texas, with a population of 145,163 and a per capita income of $55,572. The county has an UnHealth Score of 32.16, ranking 1455 out of all counties. Key health measures in Taylor, Texas, include:
- High blood pressure prevalence: 32% (Rank: 1504)
- Obesity rate: 35% (Rank: 697)
- Asthma prevalence: 10% (Rank: 696)
- Depression rate: 22% (Rank: 1320)
- No dental visit rate: 49% (Rank: 2653)

## Preparation for Consultation:
- Address asthma management and medication adherence
- Discuss stress management strategies
- Consider preventive measures for high blood pressure and obesity
- Encourage regular dental visits and mental health screenings
